mapper.select: select FROM_UNIXTIME(add_time,'%Y-%m') as names, count(name) as value from users where add_time between #{endTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and #{startTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} group by names
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into users (id, province_name, mobile, 3rd_type, openid, name, real_name, id_card, sex, introduction, level,work_start, work_end,is_door, birth_day, degree_id, major, head_img, qr_code, rest_money, score, exp, user_type, is_approval, add_from, add_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{workStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDoor,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{birthDay,jdbcType=DATE}, #{degreeId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{restMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isApproval,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{addFrom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
